content: this legal text summarizes a court case that took place in trani on march 20 2018 the case number is 709 but no further details about the parties or the case itself are provided the text explains that the costs of the litigation will be divided by twothirds with one party responsible for paying twothirds and the other party paying onethird this is to determine how community property and inheritance will be dissolved the plaintiff is ordered to pay the remaining costs due to the dismissal of their claims the court made several decisions in this case including the dissolution of community property and assigning full ownership to the defendants the defendants are also ordered to pay the plaintiff a specified amount with interest additional claims made by both parties are rejected and the costs of the experts report are shared equally the plaintiff is required to reimburse twothirds of the defendants legal costs overall this legal text explains the progress of a civil court case involving a coowner of a property plaintiff and coheirs and parent of a deceased person defendants the court rejected certain claims allocated the property to the defendants and ordered the defendants to pay the plaintiff a specified amount the court also divided the costs of the experts report equally and ordered the plaintiff to reimburse twothirds of the defendants legal costs

metadata.relationship_between_parties: co-owner of a property (plaintiff) and co-heirs and parent of a deceased person (defendants)
